      • getSignalListeners

        protected Set<SignalListener> getSignalListeners(Signal signal,
                                                 boolean create)
        Retrieves the set of listeners registered for a signal
        Parameters:
        signal - The specified Signal
        create - If true and no current listeners are mapped then creates a new Set
        Returns:
        The Set of listeners registered for the signal - may be null in case create is false
